help-file.title: ROGUE
help-file.content:
Rogues utilize the art of concealment and deception to gain an advantage over their foes. They are known to be those you'll find hiding in the shadows, waiting patiently for the perfect time to attack, rather than jumping into a fight. They are often solitary and tend to spend more time alone than the other classes.
Allowable races: Human, Duergar Dwarf, Orc, Drow Elf, Goblin Grey Elf, Mountain Dwarf, Halfling, Gnome, Half Elf Equipment usage: Rogues have their own classification of item restriction. They can use a number of weapons but are more limited in their selection of armor. They are moderately limited in their usage of miscellaneous magical items.
Rogue Specializations --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Assassin, Bravo, Thief
